title: Project Manager
description: Experience managing digital projects, strong knowledge of Agile methodologies, excellent communication and leadership skills, and ability to coordinate cross-functional teams.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Expertise in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, experience with modern frameworks like React or Vue.js, and a solid understanding of responsive web design and performance optimization.

title: Business Analyst
description: Strong analytical skills to assess business needs, experience with data analysis and process modeling, and ability to collaborate with stakeholders to define project requirements.

title: Data Analyst
description: Proficiency in SQL, Python, and data visualization tools, experience with large datasets, and the ability to extract insights to support business decision-making.
